moves.name: Bone Club
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Bone Rush
moves.effect: Hits 2 to 5 times.

moves.name: Bonemerang
moves.effect: Hits twice.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.effect: Lowers the Dexterity of all opponents hit by 1.

moves.name: Dig
moves.effect: The user digs underground for one turn, becoming untargetable. It attacks on the second turn.

moves.name: Drill Run
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.effect: Hits all Pokémon on the field except the user. Damage is doubled against targets using Dig.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.effect: This is a one-hit KO move. Its accuracy is very low.

moves.name: Headlong Rush
moves.effect: After use, the user's Vitality and Insight are lowered by 1.

moves.name: High Horsepower
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Land's Wrath
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.effect: The user rolls 1d10 to determine the magnitude. The damage is Strength + Magnitude.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's accuracy is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.effect: Reduces the damage of all Electric-type moves by half for 5 rounds.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Precipice Blades
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Rototiller
moves.effect: Raises the Strength and Special of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field by 1.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Sandsear Storm
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Shore Up
moves.effect: The user recovers HP. The amount is doubled during a Sandstorm.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.effect: Lays a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Grounded Pokémon that switch in take damage. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

moves.name: Stomping Tantrum
moves.effect: If the user's last move failed, this move's damage is doubled.

moves.name: Thousand Arrows
moves.effect: This move can hit Flying-type Pokémon and bring them to the ground.

moves.name: Thousand Waves
moves.effect: Prevents the target from switching out.
